钢琴演技；钢琴演奏技巧

word_group.brief_definition: 弹钢琴；弹奏钢琴；演奏钢琴

list.abstract: piano（英[piˈænəʊ , ˈpjɑːnəʊ]，美[piˈænoʊ , ˈpjɑːnoʊ]），英语单词。作名词为钢琴；轻柔演奏的乐段；标记为轻柔演奏的乐段。作形容词为轻柔的。作副词有轻柔的。例句：When the students saw piano keyboards in neat rows （整齐地排列）, they were quite amazed.（当学生们看到钢琴键盘整齐地排列时，他们相当惊讶）。
《Piano》是彦希演唱的一首歌曲，由彦希作词，GALLERY、彦希作曲，于2018年12月25日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, a piano. I am having lessons, listen...
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇哦，一架钢琴。我在上钢琴课呢，听……

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I haven't played piano since I was a kid. Miss Crawly, we're gonna need some piano lessons over here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可我从来没摸过钢琴。蜥太太，给我找个钢琴老师。

yingyinNormal.en: The piano doesn't murder the player if it doesn't like the music.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是钢琴不喜欢弹奏的音乐，它是不会杀了弹钢琴的人的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, before I forget, are you coming to Mike's piano bar tonight?
yingyinNormal.zh: 差点忘记，你今晚会去麦克的钢琴酒吧吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Did somebody take a picture of your piano, like, a week ago?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是不是有人一个星期前 拍了张你钢琴的照片？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you probably also had the piano teacher with the wandering hands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们或许也碰过会毛手毛脚的钢琴老师吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me, Mr. Moon? For some reason, it says here that I should be playing the piano?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，伯乐先生。你是想让我一边弹钢琴一边唱歌是吧？

yingyinNormal.en: You wanna know why she hated all those piano lessons? It's because every time she would walk in, she would see that thing and she would think about her mother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想知道为什么她讨厌那些钢琴课吗？因为每次她进去，她都会看到那架钢琴，她就会想念她的妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: A piano. I am having lessons, listen. Twinkle twinkle little star. Can I have a go? And me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我正在学钢琴呢。一闪闪亮晶晶，我能来试试吗？我也要。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, a piano. I am having lessons, listen. Twinkle twinkle little star, can I have a go? And me. Twinkle twinkle little star, how I wonder what you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一架钢琴。我正在学钢琴呢。一闪闪亮晶晶，我能来试试吗？我也要。一闪一闪亮晶晶。满天都是小星星……

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, dad, check out this video. It's a teacup pig playing a piano. I saw that. Andy sent it to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老爸，来看这个视频，一头茶杯猪在弹钢琴。我看过了，安迪给我发的。

yingyinNormal.en: But if your shower head is the only one who appreciates your vocals, how about playing chopsticks on the piano for an hour and a half?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果莲蓬头是你的唯一听众，试试花一个半小时弹弹钢琴。

yingyinNormal.en: It's impossible. It takes time to learn how to do important things like riding a bicycle or playing the piano.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个根本就不可能！重要的事需要花时间才能学会比如说骑自行车或者是弹钢琴。

yingyinNormal.en: Head Downtown to Fremont Street and into a world of old school cocktail lounges, piano bars and classic casinos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 前往市中心的弗里蒙特街，这里是怀旧鸡尾酒酒吧、钢琴酒吧和经典赌场的世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, right, the unemployed piano player who gave his trust fund to charity? I'm splitting the muffin with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是喔，那个把信托基金全捐给慈善机构的失业钢琴师吗？我要回去跟他分那个松饼的。

yingyinNormal.en: So Phoebe tells me you play piano. Yeah. You know, I used to play keyboards in college. Do you have one here? No. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比告诉我你会弹钢琴？是啊。我在大学的时候也会弹键盘。你这里有吗？没有。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on! Oh, you know, you're right. It's stupid. Just be taking up space we need for things we actually use, like the piano, oh, wait.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托！好吧，你是对的，是挺傻的。那会占据实用东西的空间，比如那架钢琴，等等，是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You heard that wrong. She's hard to understand because of the dentures she inherited. You know they were made from the keys of a child's piano.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你听错了。因为她继承的假牙，我们很难听懂她的话。你知道那假牙是儿童钢琴的琴键做的。

yingyinNormal.en: Two: she called three times at 11:00 p.m. Three: she didn't attend school on Friday. And four: she's been skipping piano classes for the last six months.
yingyinNormal.zh: 二：她在午夜十一点打过三次电话。三：星期五她没有上学。四：她已经六个月都没去上钢琴课了。

yingyinNormal.en: Margot Kim canceled her classes six months ago. What? Is she looking to restart lessons? Hold on, that doesn't make any sense. She loves piano.
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛戈·金在六个月前就把她的课取消了。什么？她是想重新上课吗？等一下，这这不可能啊。她最爱钢琴了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The music is abrupt and seemingly disconnected, as in the last <highlight>piano</highlight> sonata.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 音乐是突兀的，而且似乎是不连贯的，就像最后一首钢琴奏鸣曲。

examination_example.sentence: The second half of the 20th century saw a collection of geniuses, entrepreneurs and visionaries labour to create a fabulous machine that could function as a <highlight>piano</highlight> and radio.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪下半叶，一群天才、企业家和有远见的人努力创造了一台可以用作钢琴和收音机的神话般的机器。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

word_family.mean: n. 钢琴；轻柔演奏的乐段；标记为轻柔演奏的乐段

examination_example.sentence: As somebody who started taking <highlight>piano</highlight> lessons at the age of five, that experience changed me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一个从五岁开始学习钢琴的人，那段经历改变了我。

examination_example.sentence: If children who play the <highlight>piano</highlight> are smarter, he says, it doesn't necessarily mean they are smarter because they play the <highlight>piano</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，如果弹钢琴的孩子更聪明，并不一定意味着他们因为弹钢琴而更聪明。

examination_example.sentence: The youngsters who play the <highlight>piano</highlight> also happen to be more ambitious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弹钢琴的年轻人也恰巧更有野心。

examination_example.sentence: Most page turners are <highlight>piano</highlight> students or up-and-coming concert pianists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数翻谱员都是钢琴学生或崭露头角的音乐会钢琴家。

examination_example.sentence: Charlotte Stone will perform songs from her new best-selling CD, with James Pickering on the <highlight>piano</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夏洛特·斯通将演唱她最新畅销CD中的歌曲，詹姆斯·皮克林将在钢琴上演奏。

他给自己买了一架钢琴。

examination_example.sentence: Amy practices playing the <highlight>piano</highlight> for over two hours every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米每天练习弹钢琴两个多小时。
